TopicTitle: Noob Question: How do I make a render/snapshot of the UV position for texturing?

Articles.Content:
I\'m making an SRB in blender:

But I don\'t know how to make a render/snapshop of the UV position so that I can texture it. Can anyone help?

Thanks.

You\'ll need to do some changes to the blender workspace, swap the 'Timeline' widget for the 'UV/Image Editor' widget

Ben made a swell intro video that goes through the UVMap process: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=4032.0

Though it didn\'t explain how you export the PNG file to paint on, its under the 'UVs' menu of the UV editor window (while Blender is in Edit mode) don\'t do it until you\'re completely done editing the mesh, though.
